title: Golden Eye: The Theory of Havana Syndrome
abstract:
Beginning around 2016, US Diplomats reported unusual injuries while serving
abroad. Personnel suffered from symptoms such as nausea, vertigo, and
disorientation. The collective set of ailments was subbed "Havana Syndrome".
This whitepaper delves into an analysis of competing hypotheses with respect to
potential origins of these symptoms. Whitepaper cleared for release on 18 JUN
2024. The views expressed by this whitepaper are those of the author and do not
reflect the official policy or position of Dakota State University, the N.H.
Army National Guard, the U.S. Army, the Department of Defense, or the U.S.
Government.
